title: confuse about some code.
body:
There are some code that I can't figure out by myself, please help!

1. in generator.py file, should  the true_box_index be set to zero for every train_instance ?
https://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3/blob/25af1ba9f054aacff2f778618116629cc0c370df/generator.py#L68

2. in yolo.py file,  pred_box_conf - 0  and true_box_wh + tf.zeros_like(true_box_wh) * (1-object_mask) make no difference, I really confused about warmup training, what it is trying to do ? 
please give more explanations.
https://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3/blob/25af1ba9f054aacff2f778618116629cc0c370df/yolo.py#L74

https://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3/blob/25af1ba9f054aacff2f778618116629cc0c370df/yolo.py#L153

3. in YoloLayer there is a parameter named max_grid, when create model you pass the max_input_size to it, which is 480. but inside the create_yolov3_model this value has been multiply by 2 or 4 in different yolo layer. is that right? 
https://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3/blob/25af1ba9f054aacff2f778618116629cc0c370df/yolo.py#L324
https://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3/blob/25af1ba9f054aacff2f778618116629cc0c370df/yolo.py#L348
Thanks a lot !!!
